Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

Interface MetricsUserAggregateSource

All Superinterfaces:
BaseSource
All Known Implementing Classes:
MetricsUserAggregateSourceImpl
@Private public interface MetricsUserAggregateSource extends BaseSource
This interface will be implemented by a MetricsSource that will export metrics from multiple users into the hadoop metrics system.
